word_mean: 心动描记术：用图记录心脏的一些功能的技术。另见ballistocardiogra-phy，echocardiography，electrocardiography，electrokymography，kinetocardiography，phonocardiography，roentgenkymo-graphy，vibrocardiography等

sentence.Network_en: A total of 109 patients underwent physical examination, electrocardiogram and echo cardiography.
sentence.Network_cn: 总计109个病人做了体格检查, 心电图,超生心动图.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To Validte the Yeliabil of left ventricle ejection fraction ( LEF ) measured by reconstructed impedance cardiography ( RICG ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的验证重建心阻抗图测量左室射血分数 ( LEF ) 的可靠性.

sentence.Network_en: ACUSON Sequoia Echo 256 deliver a new level of diagnostic confidence in echo cardiography.
sentence.Network_cn: 红杉256增添更多回声回声256增添更多红杉提供一个新的水平的诊断信心回声心动.
